title.narrative: Setting a basis for sustainable growth

description.narrative:
Establishing a sustainable base for Rushere SACCO will take time. The approach aims to strengthen the internal processes to use available resources. This will be done through training exchange and advice. The activities that will be conducted range from; 

1. Developing and updating the business plan

2. Mentoring the manager

3. Formation of the youth council

4. Update of the credit/lending policy

5. Exchange program for both management and the board

The above activities shall be implemented by consultants agripoolers peer to peer exchange and a local BA.

The implementation period will be from February to November 2020

The expected results include;

Strategic plan in plan

Staff commitment

Updated credit policy

Reduced PAR

Rushere Sacco is comprised of mainly dairy farmers who are active and ambitious. The desire by management and board to help farmers to transform and increase production is key through access to reliable and cheap financial services. Rushere got a new manager who is in the process of building a team on discussing with Agriterra several gaps were identified and focus on the goal;   Establishing a firm foundation for sustainable growth. This will increase member participation and increase make the SACCO relevant to the members.

This will be a chieved through the following actions;

1. Reviewing the strategic plan                                                                                                                           2. Reviewing the lending/credit policy                                                                                                               3. Training staff on credit and board orientation                                                                                              4. Exchanges of both the board and management to learn from successful SACCO's.                                  When the above focus areas are implemented Rushere will improve service to members and achieve it's BHAG of 'Sustainable growth and service delivery to it's members'

The  major goal of the project is to set a foundation for a sustainable organisation growth for Rushere 

Strategic plan in place

Staff commitment

Updated credit policy

Reduced PAR
